bug.author: RaccoonForever
bug.description:
I have 8 different labels. When I add more than 20 (more or less, it depends on the screen) boxes on one image. If I add one more bounding box. I won't be able to scroll down to all labels. I'll be able to pick only first ones. See the screenshot linked. I have more labels under wheat but I can't access them. <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4057852/64180789-ab272980-ce65-11e9-932f-535732bfb857.png></denchmark-link>
**Desktop **
OS: Windows 10 Browser : Firefox Version : 60.0.2 (32 bits)

comments.comment: Hi, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/RaccoonForever>@RaccoonForever</denchmark-link> It seems that because a dopdown containing your labels is always placed below the record you are editing, there are some problems when the record is too low. And the dropdown can't fit. A possible fix should not be difficult. I think we will publish it with the next release. Thank you for drawing attention to this problem. I'll keep you informed of any progress.

Hi, <denchmark-link:https://github.com/RaccoonForever>@RaccoonForever</denchmark-link> Improvements have been made. They are currently available on the developer instance. <denchmark-link:https://develop.makesense.ai/>https://develop.makesense.ai/</denchmark-link> I encourage you to test and possibly further comments. The patch will enter the production instance with the next release.
Hello <denchmark-link:https://github.com/SkalskiP>@SkalskiP</denchmark-link> . Thanks for your answer and for your quick improvement ! It works like a charm on the test environment !
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/RaccoonForever>@RaccoonForever</denchmark-link> ! I'm super happy to have managed to fix it!
